original_text: But he shall not defile himself, being a chief man among his people, to profane himself.
korean_text: 제사장은 그의 백성의 어른인즉 자신을 더럽혀 속되게 하지 말지니라

sentences.original_text: But he shall not defile himself
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그는 자신을 더럽혀서는 안 됩니다

sentences.original_text: being a chief man among his people
